page.title: 16AN AMERICAN IN TREGURRIAN
page.content: I am Cliff Ancelet.When I first got here I was overwhelmed by the traffic driving on the left.To me it was the wrong side.The first thing that shocked me about my house was its age,over 250 years old.I was used to living in new houses.After 3 weeks I only noticed the high cliffs,in America I had not seen any.I made friends with the only 2 kids in the village ,in America I had at least 10 friends.I played in the open fields and hedgerows which I had never seen before.I usually played in woodland areas in America.In Tregurrian we play in an old abandoned house across the street.We visit a swamp across from my house to watch the newts,water voles,magpies and pygamy shrews.I like it here although it is different from Virginia.
